arts.ttl: Höler double secures 3-2 victory for Freiburg against Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Lucas Höler starred with two goals, while Ritsu Dōan also scored in an action-packed match at the Europa-Park Stadion. Freiburg manager Julian Schuster made three changes to his starting lineup, with last weekend's match-winner Johan Manzambi earning a first start, whilst Hoffenheim boss Christian Ilzer named an unchanged side for the first time this season.

arts.ttl: Freiburg up to fifth after huge three points
arts.sum: Freiburg secured three huge points on home soil, beating Hoffenheim 3-2 in an all-Baden clash to climb up to fifth and bolster their chances of European football.

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim opt to sever close ties with controversial Dietmar Hopp confidant
arts.sum: In response to fan protests, TSG 1899 Hoffenheim have opted to sever close ties with one of club patron Dietmar Hopp's close friends and confidants.

arts.ttl: SC Freiburg vs. TSG Hoffenheim preview: Hosts aim to bolster European chances
arts.sum: SC Freiburg will look to strengthen their chances of European football this weekend as they welcome fellow Badeners TSG Hoffenheim to Europa-Park Stadion on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Preview: Freiburg vs. Hoffenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Freiburg and Hoffenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
